intro.heading: Introduction
intro.text: The "Smart Worksheets" website (hereinafter: "the Website") is committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

collection.heading: Information Collection
collection.intro: The Website collects the following types of information:
collection.technicalDesc: IP address, browser type, operating system, pages viewed, and access times.
collection.cookiesDesc: Small files stored on your device to improve browsing experience.
collection.analyticsDesc: Anonymous usage data through analytics tools like Google Analytics.

usage.heading: Use of Information
usage.intro: The information collected is used to:
usage.improve: Improve user experience on the Website
usage.analyze: Analyze usage patterns and improve content

advertising.heading: Advertising
advertising.para1: The Website uses third-party advertising services, including Google AdSense. These providers may use cookies to display ads based on your previous visits to this or other websites.
advertising.para2: Google uses cookies to display ads based on your previous visits to this website and others. You can opt out of personalized advertising from Google by visiting

cookiesSection.heading: Cookies
cookiesSection.intro: The Website uses the following types of cookies:
cookiesSection.essentialDesc: Required for basic website operation and cannot be disabled.
cookiesSection.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors use the Website (Google Analytics).
cookiesSection.advertisingDesc: Used to display relevant advertisements (Google AdSense).
cookiesSection.consentIntro: On your first visit to the Website, you will see a cookie consent notice. You can:
cookiesSection.consentChange: You can change your preferences at any time by deleting the 'cookie_consent' cookie from your browser and refreshing the page.

sharing.heading: Information Sharing
sharing.text: We do not sell, rent, or share personal information with third parties, except as required to provide our services or as required by law.

security.heading: Information Security
security.text: We take reasonable security measures to protect the collected information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

userRights.heading: User Rights
userRights.request: Request information about the data we have collected about you
userRights.correction: Request correction or deletion of information
userRights.object: Object to processing of information for marketing purposes

changes.heading: Policy Changes
changes.text: We may update this policy from time to time. We will post any changes on this page with the last update date.
